extension.name: Hitsteps Live Stats
extension.author: Hitsteps
extension.description:
Hit Steps - an eye on your site

 Hit Steps realtime visitor activity tracker and analytics, allows you to be aware what is going in your websites right now and has detailed archive for tracked visitor data. If you don't have an API code yet, you can get your free trial one at hitsteps.com.

Get your API code
Each site has it's own API Code. It Looks like 3defb4a2e4426642ea... and can be found in setting page of hitsteps.com

How configure Hit Steps at Joomla?

Just Sign up for a hit steps account and follow steps.
Login to your hit steps account, Add your website address to your hit steps account.
then in hitsteps.com setting page, you will get your Hit Steps API code.
Paste that code in Basic Options panel field.
All your Visitors information will be tracked and logged in real-time and you can monitor them in your hitsteps.com dashboard, Real-time! and it have more to offer!

view hit steps features

Hit Steps also support normal websites ( non joomla based ) which you can see code in hitsteps.com setting page.

For Step-by-Step instruction on how install this joomla plugin, please visit our official guide.

field.name: hitstepsapi
field.label: Hitsteps API Code
field.description: You can find your Hit Steps API code in hitsteps.com Setting page of your website. You need to have a hitsteps.com account to get your website's API Key. API Key used to send your traffic for analytics to Hit Steps, it offers many features for you such as live visitor activity monitoring, starting live chat with your visitors, top pages, top referrals and much more...
